mapper.select: /* 국내 프로그램 - 육성 그래프 조회 */ SELECT GRAPH_SN , CRTR_YM , GRAPH1_YR , GRAPH1_NOCS , GRAPH2_YR , GRAPH2_NOCS , GRAPH3_YR , GRAPH3_NOCS , GRAPH4_YR , GRAPH4_NOCS , GRAPH5_YR , GRAPH5_NOCS FROM KB_ENT_GRAPH_INFO

/* 국내 프로그램 - 투자 그래프 관리 조회 */ SELECT GRAPH_SN , CRTR_YM , GRAPH1_YR , GRAPH1_NOCS , GRAPH2_YR , GRAPH2_NOCS , GRAPH3_YR , GRAPH3_NOCS , GRAPH4_YR , GRAPH4_NOCS , GRAPH5_YR , GRAPH5_NOCS FROM KB_INVEST_GRAPH_INFO

/* 국내 프로그램 - 제휴 사례 목록 조회 */ SELECT AFFI.AFFILIATE_SN AS AFFILIATE_SN , AFFI.AFFILIATE_NM AS AFFILIATE_NM , AFFI.STARTER_NM AS STARTER_NM , AFFI.SRVC_NM AS SRVC_NM , AFFI.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , AFFI.CTGRY_NM AS CTGRY_NM , FILES.FILE_NM AS AFFILIATE_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS AFFILIATE_PATH FROM KB_AFFILIATE_INFO AFFI , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE AFFI.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND AFFI.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AFFI.SORT_NO ASC

/* 국내 프로그램 - 협력 기관 리스트 조회 */ SELECT COOPE.COOPE_SN AS COOPE_SN , COOPE.BZENTY_NM AS BZENTY_NM , COOPE.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , COOPE.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS COOPE_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS COOPE_PATH FROM KB_COOPE_INFO COOPE , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE COOPE.ATCH_FILE_ID = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND COOPE.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY COOPE.COOPE_SN DESC

/* 국내 프로그램 - 육성 공간 조회 */ SELECT PLC.PLC_SN AS PLC_SN , PLC.PLC_NM AS PLC_NM , PLC.PLC_ADDR AS PLC_ADDR , PLC.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN1 AS ATCH_FILE_SN1 , FILES1.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH1 , FILES1.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME1 , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN2 AS ATCH_FILE_SN2 , FILES2.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH2 , FILES2.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME2 , PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN3 AS ATCH_FILE_SN3 , FILES3.FILE_PATH AS PLC_PATH3 , FILES3.FILE_NM AS PLC_FILE_NAME3 FROM KB_PLC_INFO PLC , KB_FILE_INFO FILES1 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES2 , KB_FILE_INFO FILES3 WHERE PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN1 = FILES1.FILE_SN(+) AND PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN2 = FILES2.FILE_SN(+) AND PLC.ATCH_FILE_SN3 = FILES3.FILE_SN(+)
/* 국내 프로그램 - 채용 지원 조회 */ SELECT EMPLOY_SN , EMPLOY_YR , EMPLOY_EMP_NOCS , SPRT_AMT , EMPLOY_ENT_NOCS , FRST_RGTR , FRST_REG_DT , LAST_MDFR , LAST_MDFCN_DT FROM KB_EMPLOY_INFO
